#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int T, n, m;

	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--){
		string number, mumber;
		cin >> number >> mumber;
		int n = number.length();
		vector<int> a(n,0);
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
			a[i] = number[i] - 48;
		}
		sort(a.begin(), a.end());
		int i = 0, j = 0;
		while(!a[j]){
			j++;
		}
		int temp = a[j];
		a[j] =  a[0];
		a[0] = temp;
		for(int i = 0; i <a.size();i++){
		//	cout<<a[i];
			a[i] += 48;
		}
		//cout<<endl;
		string test(a.begin(), a.end());
		if(test == mumber)
			cout<<"AC"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"WA"<<endl;
		//cout<<test<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
